question: As per the International Energy Agency’s (IEA) latest report, what is the position of India, in Energy consumption?
explanation:
The International Energy Agency (IEA) released the ‘India Energy Outlook 2021’ recently. As per the report, India is the world’s third-largest energy consuming country.
The report also highlighted that India will have the biggest share of energy demand growth at 25% over the next two decades. India's energy consumption could touch USD 8.6 trillion by 2040, as per the national policy scenario.
